News news:
So here's the main crux with the supreme court's decision on hobby lobby; the argument in favor of hobby lobby relies on a 1993 law that was already struck down.  I bet this isn't over yet cause if it relies on a law that was struck down ages ago then chances are it's going to be brought up again.

topics.body:
Well fuck me. . . . I thought that companies with the hobby lobby ruling would just go after birth control, but nope shit's hit the fan.  Here's some interesting things that are being looked at to be legalized under "religious freedom", trying to get out of paying taxes, domestic violence and holy fuck honor killings.

Holy fuck!  No offense but protecting fucking honor killings under "religious freedom" are you fucking nuts?
